evidence.claim: Mobile Clinic utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The platform adheres to HIPAA regulations for patient data management.
Integration with FHIR standards for health data exchange is supported.
They implement RESTful APIs to connect with EHR systems.
Mobile Clinic processes transactions compliant with X12 standards.
Utilizes Azure services for scalable solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of X12 transaction use cases or EDI integration found.
